<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Stone Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3012)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Stone giants are stoic, reclusive herders and artists with a rich history and collection of traditions. They dwell in caves in tall mountains and craggy ranges, where their grayish skin allows them to blend in with their surroundings and go unnoticed, despite being around 12 feet tall. Benign travelers who come across a clan of stone giants need not worry, however, for stone giants do not actively invite confrontation or strife. They are, by and large, peaceful people who seek wisdom through exploration of nature and long meditations on the elements of the natural world. Their elders are among the wisest of giants, using their charisma and druidic magic to lead their clans to prosperity and harmony with nature.

 A stone giant clan will usually raise a number of animals as pets, favoring [cave bears](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2851), [elephants](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2993), or [dinosaurs](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=391) depending on the environment. Many clans also accept allies, considering [arboreals](/Languages.aspx?ID=26), [elementals](/Traits.aspx?ID=587), and even [gargoyles](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3001) as kin through their shared connection with the earth.

</row>

**Swat Projectile** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirements** The stone giant must have a free hand but can Release anything as part of this reaction; **Trigger** The giant is targeted by a physical ranged attack; **Effect** The stone giant gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses and the projectile was made of stone, the giant can throw it back at the attacker as a rock ranged Strike.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatclub_ +21 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d10+12 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+14 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +18 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+12 bludgeoning

**Big Swing** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The stone giant makes a greatclub Strike. The target is [Pushed](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=47) up to 10 feet on a hit or up to 20 feet on a critical hit. If the target collides with a solid object, it takes bludgeoning damage as though it had [fallen](/Rules.aspx?ID=402) the distance it moved.

**Create Boulder** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The stone giant molds a boulder from primal earth and throws it as a rock Strike. A creature hit by the Strike must succeed at a DC 26 Reflex save or be knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88).

</column>
